mapper.update: UPDATE gm_user_account SET TOTAL_AMOUNT = IFNULL(TOTAL_AMOUNT, 0) + #{addMoney} ,BALANCE = IFNULL(BALANCE,0) + #{addMoney} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND CURRENCY = #{currency}
UPDATE gm_user_account SET TOTAL_AMOUNT = IFNULL(TOTAL_AMOUNT, 0) - #{subMoney} ,BALANCE = IFNULL(BALANCE,0) - #{subMoney} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND CURRENCY = #{currency}
UPDATE gm_user_account SET BALANCE = IFNULL(BALANCE, 0) - #{freezeMoney} ,FROZEN = IFNULL(FROZEN,0) + #{freezeMoney} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND CURRENCY = #{currency}
